column4: i have a printer and it was not detected by ubuntu by default...how can i use it? the model is HP 900 Inkjet Printer
i have a printer and it was not detected by ubuntu by default...how can i use it? the model is HP 900 Inkjet Printer can anyone help me?
i have a printer and it was not detected by ubuntu by default...how can i use it? the model is HP 900 Inkjet Printer can anyone help me?
go to your menu, sys > admin > printers, and install it.
